quote: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
author: Bob Marley

quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
author: Richard Bach

quote: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Never above you. Never below you. Always beside you.
author: Walter Winchell

quote: Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other. Perhaps they should live next door and just visit now and then.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Find joy in everything you choose to do. Every job, relationship, home... it's your responsibility to love it, or change it.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Nothing is perfect. Life is messy. Relationships are complex. Outcomes are uncertain. People are irrational.
author: Hugh Mackay

quote: But let there be spaces in your togetherness and let the winds of the heavens dance between you. Love one another but make not a bond of love: let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I believe that two people are connected at the heart, and it doesn't matter what you do, or who you are or where you live; there are no boundaries or barriers if two people are destined to be together.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I think it matters whether someone has a good heart.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
author: Washington Irving

quote: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: What love we've given, we'll have forever. What love we fail to give, will be lost for all eternity.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Kindness in women, not their beauteous looks, shall win my love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I, with a deeper instinct, choose a man who compels my strength, who makes enormous demands on me, who does not doubt my courage or my toughness, who does not believe me naive or innocent, who has the courage to treat me like a woman.
author: Anais Nin

quote: A person isn't who they are during the last conversation you had with them - they're who they've been throughout your whole relationship.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
author: Henry Winkler

quote: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: You have people come into your life shockingly and surprisingly. You have losses that you never thought you'd experience. You have rejection and you have learn how to deal with that and how to get up the next day and go on with it.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I'm lucky in having found the perfect partner to spend my life with.
author: Sara Paretsky

quote: We don't develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
author: Mike Murdock

quote: The one who loves the least, controls the relationship.
author: Robert Anthony

quote: In human relationships, kindness and lies are worth a thousand truths.
author: Graham Greene

quote: If civilization is to survive, we must cultivate the science of human relationships - the ability of all peoples, of all kinds, to live together, in the same world at peace.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: People change and forget to tell each other.
author: Lillian Hellman

quote: Falling in love and having a relationship are two different things.
author: Keanu Reeves

quote: We can improve our relationships with others by leaps and bounds if we become encouragers instead of critics.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Absence diminishes mediocre passions and increases great ones, as the wind extinguishes candles and fans fires.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The relationship between husband and wife should be one of closest friends.
author: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at other's woe.
author: Homer

quote: Truth is, I'll never know all there is to know about you just as you will never know all there is to know about me. Humans are by nature too complicated to be understood fully. So, we can choose either to approach our fellow human beings with suspicion or to approach them with an open mind, a dash of optimism and a great deal of candour.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: We've got this gift of love, but love is like a precious plant. You can't just accept it and leave it in the cupboard or just think it's going to get on by itself. You've got to keep watering it. You've got to really look after it and nurture it.
author: John Lennon

quote: Treasure your relationships, not your possessions.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: I am convinced that material things can contribute a lot to making one's life pleasant, but, basically, if you do not have very good friends and relatives who matter to you, life will be really empty and sad and material things cease to be important.
author: David Rockefeller

quote: We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: If so many men, so many minds, certainly so many hearts, so many kinds of love.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: You can never control who you fall in love with, even when you're in the most sad, confused time of your life. You don't fall in love with people because they're fun. It just happens.
author: Kirsten Dunst

quote: Who cares about the clouds when we're together? Just sing a song and bring the sunny weather.
author: Dale Evans

quote: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.
author: Lord Byron

quote: If you want a love message to be heard, it has got to be sent out. To keep a lamp burning, we have to keep putting oil in it.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Before machines the only form of entertainment people really had was relationships.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: Some think love can be measured by the amount of butterflies in their tummy. Others think love can be measured in bunches of flowers, or by using the words 'for ever.' But love can only truly be measured by actions. It can be a small thing, such as peeling an orange for a person you love because you know they don't like doing it.
author: Marian Keyes

quote: I was born when you kissed me. I died when you left me. I lived a few weeks while you loved me.
author: Humphrey Bogart

quote: Flatter me, and I may not believe you. Criticize me, and I may not like you. Ignore me, and I may not forgive you. Encourage me, and I will not forget you. Love me and I may be forced to love you.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: The heart of another is a dark forest, always, no matter how close it has been to one's own.
author: Willa Cather

quote: God is more interested in your future and your relationships than you are.
author: Billy Graham

quote: He who lives in our mind is near though he may actually be far away; but he who is not in our heart is far though he may really be nearby.
author: Chanakya

quote: I love you, and because I love you, I would sooner have you hate me for telling you the truth than adore me for telling you lies.
author: Pietro Aretino

quote: Adapt yourself to the things among which your lot has been cast and love sincerely the fellow creatures with whom destiny has ordained that you shall live.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The heart is forever inexperienced.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Girls we love for what they are; young men for what they promise to be.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: A healthy relationship is built on unwavering trust.
author: Beau Mirchoff

quote: It is not our purpose to become each other; it is to recognize each other, to learn to see the other and honor him for what he is.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Love comes when manipulation stops; when you think more about the other person than about his or her reactions to you. When you dare to reveal yourself fully. When you dare to be vulnerable.
author: Joyce Brothers
